title: A Weaver Holiday Homecoming
description: A family for the holidays - and forever! After Mallory Keegan's sister died in childbirth, she vowed to do one find her niece's father. Mallory never expected her quest to lead her to Weaver and its most mysterious resident, Ryan Clay. Brooding, elusive Ryan was an unlikely dad for little Chloe...and unexpectedly set Mallory's blood burning with desire. Ryan was stunned by how strongly he felt about his newfound daughter - and the sparks that simmered between him and Chloe's tantalising aunt. They were turning out to be the best Christmas gift he had never imagined...
author: Allison Leigh
